title: Let the S-O-N Shine On You
itunes:title: Let the S-O-N Shine On You
description:
You have God’s power living on the inside! Allow His light to shine on you today. When you remove the burdens and distractions, His light will burst forth powerfully in your life.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
